Scalar_ExternalClusterStrain: Apply an external strain over the particles. If this strain is over the internal one, the cluster will break.
Scalar_Kill: Disable the particles for which the field will be higher than 0.
Scalar_DisableThreshold: Disable the particles if their linear and angular velocity are less than the threshold.
Scalar_SleepingThreshold: Set particles in sleeping mode if their linear and angular velocity are less than the threshold.
Scalar_InternalClusterStrain: Add a strain field to the particles internal one.
Scalar_DynamicConstraint: Add the particles to a spring constraint holding them together
